scripts.pack-prepare: npm run doc  &&  npm run compile
scripts.pack-test: npm run pack-prepare  &&  electron-builder build --win --dir --publish never
scripts.pack-macos: npm run pack-prepare  &&  electron-builder build --mac --universal --publish never
scripts.pack-linux-x86: npm run pack-prepare  &&  electron-builder build --linux --publish never
scripts.pack-linux-arm64: npm run pack-prepare  &&  electron-builder build --linux --arm64 --publish never
scripts.publish-itchio: npm run pack-win  &&  butler push "redist/LDtk %npm_package_version% installer.exe" deepnight/ldtk:win --userversion-file ../lastBuildVersion.txt
scripts.quicktype: npm i -g quicktype  &&  npm run qt-cs  &&  npm run qt-js  &&  npm run qt-py  &&  npm run qt-rs  &&  npm run qt-go  &&  npm run qt-cpp
